DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: API Says Alternate Fuels Get $ 1-Billion Federal Subsidy : A study by the American Petroleum Institute , the largest trade association of the U.S. oil and natural_gas industry , says that total federal support for all alternative fuels and vehicles is currently running more_than $ 1 billion a year . The study , released at API ' s annual meeting held_in Century City , lumps such direct_support as research grants for improved electric_batteries along with the less-direct financial effects of such federal requirements as those mandating increased use of cleaner-burning fuels by federal fleets .
